cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: @@{calm_application_name}@@
fqdn: @@{calm_application_name}@@.@@{domainName}@@
users:
  - name: ntnxcalm
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{sshPublicKey}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:Nutanix2021!
  expire: False
ssh_pwauth:   true
#Config net file
runcmd:
  - [service, network, restart]
  - [systemctl, mask, cloud-init-local, cloud-init, cloud-config, cloud-final]
  - [eject]

attrs.script:
pc_admin = "nx2Tech253!"
pc_url="https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/"
vpcName='@@{getVpc}@@'

def get_resource_list(url, params):
    try:
        r=urlreq(
            url, 
            verb='POST', 
            params=json.dumps(params), 
            headers={
              'Content-Type': 'application/json',  
              'Accept':'application/json'
            }, 
            auth="BASIC", 
            user="admin", 
            passwd= pc_admin, 
            verify=False
        )
        resp=json.loads(r.content)
    except Exception as e:
        print e
    return resp

def get_vpc_uuid(vpcName):
    vpc_url = pc_url + "v3/vpcs/list"
    params={
      "kind": "vpc",
      "length": 500,
      "filter": "name=={}".format(vpcName)
    }
    resp = (get_resource_list(vpc_url, params))
    return resp["entities"][0]["metadata"]["uuid"]
  
def get_subnetVpc_by_vpc(vpcName):
    listSelection=[]
    vpc_uuid=get_vpc_uuid(vpcName)
    subnet_url = pc_url+"v3/subnets/list"
    params={
      "kind": "subnet",
      "length": 500,
      "filter": "subnet_type==OVERLAY"
    }
    resp = get_resource_list(subnet_url, params)
    for subnetVpcObj in resp["entities"]:
      if subnetVpcObj["spec"]["resources"]["vpc_reference"]["uuid"]==vpc_uuid:
        listSelection.append(subnetVpcObj['spec']['name']) 
    return listSelection

vpcList=get_subnetVpc_by_vpc(vpcName)
listSelection = sorted(dict.fromkeys(vpcList))
print ",".join(map(str,listSelection))

pc_admin = "nx2Tech253!"
pc_url="https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/"

def get_resource_list(url, params):
    try:
        r=urlreq(
            url, 
            verb='POST', 
            params=json.dumps(params), 
            headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json',  'Accept':'application/json'}, 
            auth="BASIC", 
            user="admin", 
            passwd= pc_admin, 
            verify=False
        )
        resp=json.loads(r.content)
    except Exception as e:
        print e
    return resp
  
def get_vpc():
    listSelection = []
    vpc_url = pc_url+"v3/vpcs/list"
    params={
      "kind": "vpc",
      "length": 500
    }
    resp = get_resource_list(vpc_url, params)
    for vpcObj in resp["entities"]:
      listSelection.append(vpcObj['spec']['name']) 
    return listSelection

vpcList=get_vpc()
listSelection = sorted(dict.fromkeys(vpcList))
print ",".join(map(str,listSelection))

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: @@{calm_application_name}@@
fqdn: @@{calm_application_name}@@.@@{domainName}@@
users:
  - name: ntnxcalm
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{sshPublicKey}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:Nutanix2021!
  expire: False
ssh_pwauth:   true
#Config net file
runcmd:
  - [service, network, restart]
  - [systemctl, mask, cloud-init-local, cloud-init, cloud-config, cloud-final]
  - [eject]

pc_url="https://localhost:9440/api/nutanix/"

def get_resource_list(url, params):

            url,

              'Content-Type': 'application/json',  
              'Accept':'application/json'

            auth="BASIC",

        )
        resp=json.loads(r.content)
    except Exception as e:

      "kind": "vpc",

    }
